Warning

Because this documentation is pulled in from external sources, it may not match the DFHack distribution exactly.

  • Some scripts should have a prefix (eg listed as myscript, should be gui/myscript) but don’t.
  • Some sections of documentation may refer to scripts which are not distributed with DFHack.
